body.name: Perlegear UL-Listed Full Motion TV Wall Mount for 40–86 Inch Flat Curved TVs up to 132 lbs, 12″/16″ Wood Studs, TV Mount Bracket with Tool-Free Tilt, Swivel, Extension, Max VESA 600 x 400mm, PGLF15
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 17 hrs 5 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 17 hrs 5 mins
features: Upgraded Strength: Made with 33% thicker articulating arms and a larger reinforced wall plate (17.1″ x 10.6″), this UL-listed TV wall mount provides solid support for large TVs up to 132 lbs. Security locks and anti-drop end caps ensure maximum TV mount stability for long-lasting performance.

Perfect Fit for Large TVs: The Perlegear articulating TV mount is the perfect mounting solution for 40″ to 86″ TVs with VESA patterns 200 x 100mm to 600 x 400mm. The wall mount TV bracket can be installed on 12″/16″ wood studs, solid concrete, or brick walls. Please do not mount on drywall alone.

Enjoy Flexible Viewing: This full-motion TV mount provides 50% smoother movement so you can enjoy a range of flexibility without compromising stability. Tilt your TV without tools +5°/-15° to avoid glare and swivel +/-45° for a more immersive viewing experience from multiple angles.

Smooth TV Extension: The swivel and tilt TV mount can extend 16.3″ to bring your screen closer for a better viewing angle or for easier access to connections on the back. Retract the TV mount back to 2.9″ from the wall for a streamlined look that saves space.

Hassle-Free Installation: The TV mount is easy to install thanks to detailed instructions, hardware kit, and convenient drilling template. Please contact our U.S.-based product support team if you have any questions about wall mount installation or product selection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing, I would buy again
reviews.reviewText: The Perlegear UL-Listed Full Motion TV Wall Mount is a reliable and sturdy option for mounting your flat or curved TV. With its impressive weight capacity of up to 132 lbs, it can securely hold TVs ranging from 40 to 86 inches in size.One of the standout features of this TV wall mount is its full motion capability. It allows for smooth and effortless adjustments, including tilting, swiveling, and extending. This flexibility ensures that you can achieve the perfect viewing angle from anywhere in the room. Whether you want to reduce glare or optimize the viewing experience, this wall mount has you covered.Installation is made easy with the Perlegear UL-Listed Full Motion TV Wall Mount. It comes with a clear and detailed instruction manual, along with all the necessary hardware. The mount is also UL-listed, ensuring that it meets the highest safety standards.The build quality of this wall mount is impressive. It is constructed with durable materials that provide stability and support for your TV. The design is sleek and low-profile, allowing your TV to sit close to the wall for a clean and modern look.Overall, the Perlegear UL-Listed Full Motion TV Wall Mount is a reliable and versatile option for securely mounting your TV. With its full motion capabilities, easy installation process, and sturdy build quality, it offers great value for its price. Whether you have a flat or curved TV, this wall mount is a solid choice for enhancing your viewing experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great TV wall mount that’s easy to install!
reviews.reviewText: Full featured, heavy duty TV wall mount that has multiple options for adjustments and leveling. Easy to use instructions and includes a wide variety of mounting accessories. Took me less than 10 minutes to install. Highly recommend this product, you won’t be disappointed!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good mount and fairly easy to install for 86" TV
reviews.reviewText: Good price and great big TV mount. No complaint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall, again a good product, easy installation and good value for the money
reviews.reviewText: I wrote a similar review for the smaller version of this product.https://www.amazon.com/gp/customer-reviews/R344LERTN6OK5T/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&ASIN=B0B8YZ5TR4Overall, this is a very good product. I had actually purchased to install one TV and ended up installing on a different one. The template that's included is very helpful along with the installation video. The instructions are really, including letting you know what additional tools will be needed. Be sure you have a good stud finder and good drill to get your pilot holes started. This might be where you spend a bit of your time.I also liked the recommended, "stress / tension test" the instructions have you perform before mounting your TV.The TV braces are designed well and make it easy to take the TV down if needed.Some Cons / areas that could be improved:1) Take extra care with the TV Braces as they have rough/sharp edges. As I learned the hard way by getting a nasty cut while making some adjustments.2) The spacers provided were of limited help. For this application, I didn't need them.3) This one is important. I'd recommend purchasing a separate installation hardware kit. The variety pack that this mounting kit ships with is nice but doesn't have everything. It didn't come with the size I needed. Fortunately, I had additional bolts from another hardware installation kit that were just the right fit.4) Lastly, this product ships with 4 good size Lag Screws that you use to secure the mount to the studs in your wall. For my application, these were too short and I need to purchase longer ones, for added support and safety. For this application, I do wish all the screws and bolts were stainless steel vs zinc plated.All-in-all it's not a bad product for the price.
